page.title: 07ASKEW HILL FARM, QUERNMORE 3
page.content: At this time of year (July) weather permitting they are haytiming.They rise at 7.00am and check the stock then if it's a sunny day they are out in the fields.At this particular time of year they take the lambs to the auction. Mrs Hughes enjoys being a farmer's wife and wouldn't like to be any thing else, because she doesn't get bored and she's always busy.The house is very important to a farm because it is the office, doctors and veterinary surgery. She helps alot at lambing time but she doesn't help as much on the farm as she used to. However she is still as busy as ever preparing meals for her husband and helpers.She has a lovely view from her house and loves living there.
